item.description:
This announcement arrived over the weekend.  If you want to attend, BE SURE to buy your ticket early!  This is more for information than a formal Meetup.

__________________________________________________________________ 

Be a star!

Come stroll the red carpet for pixELATION! a benefit celebrating dazzling 4k digital cinema newly installed at Hartford’s Cinestudio. Join fellow film lovers for a reception, prizes, and screening of Scorsese’s Hugo, followed by a lively panel discussion moderated by Colin McEnroe, the witty and opinionated blogger and WNPR host, and longtime patron of Cinestudio.

Saturday October 27, 2012 6-10 pm

6 pm Reception featuring heavenly hors d'oeuvres, beverages, dessert and fabulous auction prizes

7 pm Screening of Hugo, Martin Scorsese's award winning homage to cinema

9:15 pm Panel discussion featuring film scholars (panelists to be announced) moderated by Colin McEnroe.

Get your tickets now! (Credit cards accepted)
Advance: $20 Seniors/ Students with ID/ Friends of Cinestudio
$25 General public
Purchase advance tickets online at: http://cinestudio.brownpapertickets.com

At the door: $25 Seniors/ Students with ID/ Friends of Cinestudio
$30 General public


Plenty of free on-site secure parking!
Cinestudio (on the campus of Trinity College)
300 Summit Street - at College Terrace
Hartford, CT 06106

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: pixElation @ Cinestudio - Red Carpet Fundraiser
